quotes.author: Hades
quotes.quote: When freaky aliens give you lemons, make freaky alien lemonade.

quotes.author: Satoru Iwata
quotes.quote: On my business card, I am a corporate president. In my mind, I am a game developer. But in my heart, I am a gamer.

quotes.author: Velvet Crowe
quotes.quote: Birds fly because they want to fly. They don’t need a reason. Even if their wings may snap and doom them to die. They don’t fly for anyone’s benefit. They don’t fly because they were ordered to. Birds fly because they want to fly and for no other reason!

quotes.author: Ging Freecss
quotes.quote: You Should Enjoy The Little Detours To The Fullest. Because That's Where You'll Find The Things More Important Than What You Want.

quotes.author: Darkwing Duck
quotes.quote: I am the terror that flaps in the night!
